title: Understanding Human Nature Through Literary Inquiry: Practical Insight Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental literary analysis skills and general understanding of human behavior patterns
context.additional_context: Face-to-face collaborative learning environments emphasizing job applicability for current practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can derive three or more universal characteristics of human nature by analyzing psychological motivations of literary characters
Learners can comparatively explain two or more behavioral decision factors in real-world social contexts through text-based inquiry dialogues with peers
Learners can present one actionable insight applicable to real life after writing a reflective journal based on literary work appreciation experiences

resources: Three modern novels allowing multi-layered interpretation
Small Group Discussion Space Configuration Kit

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
